actions.effect: FREE - Place 3 influence cubes in BAR_01 (Commander's Tower)
FREE - Increase Barracks district total VP by +1 (I control the entire district)

actions.ability: 4 Gain 5 crowns but increase exposure by 1

actions.effect: FREE - Place 4 influence cubes in DOC_01 (Harbormaster Office, 4 VP)

influence_placements.rationale: Retake Commander's Tower (4 VP) after P3's Steele removed my influence. Combined with Varro's 3 ability cubes = 13 total, ensuring absolute control.
Throne Room (4 VP) is uncontested. Military faction has Palace access. Secures additional high-value square for cycle-end scoring.

free_actions.power: Controller may remove 1 influence from any square per turn
free_actions.rationale: Remove 1 P3 cube from Silk Bazaar (MKT_04) to degrade their Market position

strategic_summary.primary_objective: Retake BAR_01 (Commander's Tower, 4 VP) lost to P3's Steele attack
strategic_summary.secondary_objective: Maximize VP before cycle transition through district control and gold accumulation

reasoning: CYCLE 2 FINALE - Maximum resource extraction. P3 attacked BAR_01 with Steele, removing my influence from the 4 VP Commander's Tower. I must retake it to maintain full Barracks district control (currently district_controller: 1). With 4 actions (Noble Charter bonus), I activate four abilities for 7 FREE influence cubes plus gold generation. Valorian's VP adjustment increases Barracks total value since I control the entire district. Full 18-cube pool deployed: 10 to BAR_01 (overwhelming force to guarantee control), 8 to PAL_01 (uncontested 4 VP Throne Room). Faction bug limits placement to Military-accessible districts (Barracks, Palace). Blackbeard's Docks cubes still deploy via ability. Final state: BAR_01 secured (13 cubes), PAL_01 claimed (8 cubes), DOC_01 established (4 cubes). Gold rises to 7 for cycle-end conversion. Exposure at 1 is acceptable. No petitions completable (Korrath and Lyra blocked). Barracks district power removes 1 P3 cube from Market. The mathematical optimization is complete - maximum VP extraction achieved for cycle transition.
